XML Calabash Reference (Version 0.10)

Chapter 1. Running XML Calabash

Table of Contents

  • 1. Setting up the environment
  • 2. The command line
  • 3. What do I do if it all goes wrong?

This chapter describes how to run XML Calabash from the command-line. If you're using the processor embedded in some other application, please consult the documentation for that application for details about how to run and control it.
